backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining restaurants, menu items, user profiles, and orders with authorization checks and basic query endpoints for profiles and restaurant browsing.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for authentication, restaurant browsing, ordering, and tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend files including components, hooks, pages, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables for the appâ€™s visual design.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell containing a root div and script loader for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring up routing, authentication state, profile setup flow, layout wrapper, and protected routes for orders.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: React context managing cart items with add/remove/update/clear operations and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: TypeScript interfaces defining the UI-layer structure of cart items.
Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Displays a login prompt using Internet Identity when the user is unauthenticated; otherwise renders children.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryStat: Provides loading skeletons, error alerts, and empty state UI components for query results.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header navigation, cart badge, auth button, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Shows a modal prompting the user to enter their name and saves the profile using a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, reinitializing on identity change and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and updates the current user's profile using actor-based queries and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, exposes identity and login actions, and provides a context provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderDetail.ts: Fetches order status and order items for a given orderId using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Fetches a list of the caller's orders, currently returning an empty array as the backend lacks implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlaceOrder.ts: Creates a mutation to place an order and invalidates order-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestaurant.ts: Fetches restaurant details and menu items for a given restaurantId via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestaurants.ts: Retrieves a list of all restaurants using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for theming, including light and dark mode color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it in InternetIdentityProvider and React Query client setup.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart UI, handles quantity updates, item removal, authentication checks, and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays order status and items, with loading, error, refresh, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersListPage.tsx: Displays a list of the user's past orders with status, total amount, and navigation to order details.
Shows restaurant details and menu items, manages per-item quantities, and handles adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/RestaurantsListPage.t: Lists all available restaurants with navigation to each restaurant's detail page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, extended theme settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a food ordering system with existing implemented features and pending feature requests, including authentication, browsing, ordering, and tracking.
